name: Zombie Crisis
description:
Zombie Crisis is a third-person shooter survival game in which players collect food, weapons, ammunition, and medical kits. As well as fight the zombies encountered.

Features:
1, Survive
Physical values decrease over time, players need to collect food and use food to increase their fitness.

2, Zombie attack
Vigilant, massive zombies that can move quickly and attack the player pose a significant threat to the player's survival.

3, Medium size map
Medium-sized maps have several places where players can collect resources, and players need to collect resources from those locations to survive.
